SendTrap function

function SendTrap(Const Dest, Source, Enterprise, Community: string; Generic, Specific, Seconds: Integer; Const MIBName, MIBValue: string; MIBtype: Integer): Integer;

Unit
SNMPTrap

Description
A very useful function and example of its use would be found in the TTrapSNMP object.

It implements a Trap to send with all data in the parameters.
